website_summaries.verdict: A durable combination lock for your gun trigger with padding to protect your gun and a durable construction.
pros: Combination tends to work a little easier than others on the market
cons: These locks could be possibly pulled apart, even without the combination

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Lock
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly as described. It feels solid and locks well. The wheels actually turn really smooth and nice. I'm not sure why other people complain about it turning hard, maybe I am just lucky. It didn't come with instructions but the default code is 000 and then you turn the lock counter clockwise then you can pull the lock off your trigger. To change your combination, you have to unlock it, then on the right side of the lock module, there is a little pin hole. Stick something in there and then change your code to what you desire. Then release the pin. Your code will now be set.
customer_reviews.author: MY2KSapphire

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: Typical Chinese quality. Some small washer fell out of somewhere the first time I opened. Still seemed to work. Crudely made, numbers are not very legible. Wouldn't want to have to open this in a hurry. I have an old Master lock brand with a key, and its vastly better quality.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganReview

customer_reviews.title: Same as the Master Lock gun trigger lock but at a lower price
customer_reviews.text: I have a Master Lock just like this, and it was more expensive than this product. It worked just like my Master Lock by securing my pistol. These trigger locks are a lot better than the cable locks and easier to take off if you need to quickly. It also complies with the law for locking up your guns from your children. I've tested it and it won't come off unless you have the combination. The other lock that this manufacturer makes is the key trigger lock and I also have that lock and it works great. I highly recommend this type of lock to people who own pistols.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hero

customer_reviews.title: Good lock to stop kids
customer_reviews.text: There is a YouTube video of someone beating this lock in under 90 seconds, but they are smarter or more dexterous than myself. I have this lock so that if a wayward child happens upon my bedside self defense shotgun they are unlikely to accidentally shoot themselves or someone else. I think it will stop a child, but may not stop a determined adult. I do not regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tcaudillky

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: crap quality, crude build, comes in a pre-opened box as if it was used, rubber kept falling off of the lock, no instructions - I've seen better quality at the flea market. Best of all, these con artists won't let you return it. Buy at your own risk, but 100% not worth the cheap parts it was made out of.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE Look for another brand, you cannot reset the combination.
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM IS NOT RETURNABLE THRU AMAZON!!!!! I would recommend you look for another brand. I tried to set the combination but when the lock is open and you depress the reset pin (with a paperclip) the numbers cannot be turned. This means you cannot make a personal combination, it will always be 000.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great easy way to be a more responsible gun owner. The code is easy to set for yourself, and the all metal and rubber construction make it impossible to pry apart with hands, a screwdriver, and hammer as I tried to do this to make sure it was a safe, well made product to protect my firearm.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Orjoux

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS PLEASE CHECK YOURS ACTUALLY LOCKS MINE DID NOT LOCK
customer_reviews.text: Purcahased this item in October 2015 since I was a new father and wanted to take precautions , my pistol has been stored in my drawer only used couple times. This morning I check on it and the lock is unlocked. The lock only locks when only one digit is not line up other than that is wide open.. I'm very thankful my 3 year old never digs through stuff it could have been bad. Be warned. I'll make a video to go along with this review later
customer_reviews.author: J.Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Too bad I cannot give it a zero
customer_reviews.text: Too bad I cannot give it a zero. I had bought similar products so I purchased this. From the time I tried to set the combination I had problems with it. Now it is locked (thank god not around my gun), and doesn't open. I tried to return it (even with the help of Amazon and the seller is none responsive. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: WIZOFGOLF

customer_reviews.title: Works OK. Here's how to change the combo when the instructions are wrong.
customer_reviews.text: It works. The combination wheels are a bit hard to turn and to see, even with my reading glasses. I had to message the seller to get instructions on how to set the combination. Both of their responses were not comprehensible because they were for a different model/configuration of the lock. Eventually I figured it out -- while unlocked press in the "shaft" of the combo while changing the combo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is good, however
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good, however, the item came without instructions and in a box way too big for it. When I contacted the seller about how to set the combination, I got no response and resorted to research on the web to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Narb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe mine came with an instruction manual, so I had to look up how to set the code. Also, opening and closing it is a little rough, so consider adding a drop or two of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Cola Henrique

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: No instructions provided with gun lock. It looks like a nice lock but it doesn't do any good without the ability to change the lock 000 default.
customer_reviews.author: David Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of garbage. You will never get your weapon unlocked in time
customer_reviews.author: Richard sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Not great but good enough for what I wanted them for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Not great but good enough for what I wanted them for. Squirt some penetrating oil on all the tumblers first, let it soak in then clean it off. They work a lot easier. No instructions but the information on the Q&A on this website help me set the combinations. All in all decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Here's how to change the code
customer_reviews.text: This lock works great for me. No problem reading numbers, wheels turn fine and in both directions. Watch this YouTube, it's the same locking mechanism. Takes 10 seconds and a ball point pen: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This does not work well on an AR, but ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not work well on an AR, but worked perfectly on my pistol and worked ok on my shotgun.
customer_reviews.author: BKuhl

customer_reviews.title: gun lock
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how to set a combo and the dials are very hard to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feel for cheap price; not California listed FSD but somewhat heavy/solid
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and solid enough for $8 but not a quality lock. I was surprised that it's about the same price as the Allen Company 15415 lock that's better is just about every way for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: BoaltGeek

customer_reviews.title: Gun Trigger Lock
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my small caliber pistol. Would be nice if they sent directions on how to set the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived w/o combo code or instructions on how to reset the code.
customer_reviews.author: nelida ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great gun lock
customer_reviews.text: works great and makes your gun secure. easy to change the combination with the instructions included and does not harm your firearm due to the rubber in between the lock and the gun.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lock for your firearm. But my biggest issue is the fact you have go on YouTube to find out how to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Work great on my rifle and hand gun.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Universal Combination Gun Trigger Lock because it is easy to set-up and don't need the key. It is work very well with my rifle and hand gun (9mm). The price was one of the best around in the market and shipping was very fast too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sykes

customer_reviews.title: No documentation
customer_reviews.text: The lock is ok but comes with no documentation or information on where to obtain documentation. I consider this to be unacceptable and will not purchase from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Ken Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Moved on to master-lock
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work out well for me. The rubber pads fell off during first use. They won't re-seat properly. I moved on to the mater-lock version.
customer_reviews.author: D. PLANTE

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised except that regardless of how hard i ...
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised except that regardless of how hard i clamp the 2 pieces together when locking it, the locked assembly can be moved around in the trigger space if a fair amount of force is applied. this is worrisome because the safety can be exposed, disengaged, and then the lock can be pushed against the trigger causing it to fire.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a solid trigger lock
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid trigger lock. Was a bit too small for what I need, but sturdy construction. None the less.
customer_reviews.author: DW843

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, especially after I figured out how ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, especially after I figured out how to use it, due to no instructions included with order........
customer_reviews.author: LEO13

customer_reviews.title: Comes with no instruction on how to have combination.
customer_reviews.text: Product came with no instructions at all on how to change combination. It’s a trigger lock! The idea is to protect unwanted access with a lock with a secure passcode. Pretty difficult to do when the default is “000”.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I would give this negative stars if I could. ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this negative stars if I could. As long as the first number of the code is right the lock will open. I have multiple locks with the same problem so its not unlikely to say there are more out there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. Has a nice rubber boot that conforms well ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Has a nice rubber boot that conforms well to the trigger guard. Feels very solid. The boot has molded features on the back that help position it correctly on the trigger guard.
customer_reviews.author: plaidgirl

customer_reviews.title: my suggestion would be to spend a little more for something better!
customer_reviews.text: Description says "Simple & reliable locking device, Custom-set your own 3-digit lock code" That may be true IF they gave directions on how to set you own code and the number wheels turned easier. While in the "000" position it does lock and unlock ok so I did give 3 stars, my suggestion would be to spend a little more for something better!
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Muller, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Recommended BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trigger lock for my son's BB rifle as a safety measure. The lock fit perfectly and was easy to figure out. I would buy this product again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: straightforward

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: Attached to three separate firearms and did not seat well. Would not feel comfortable having this on any firearm. If you want it to look secure this is a great deterrent, but that's about it. Not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Henry

customer_reviews.title: so easy to set my code and it feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this lock. Resetting the combination to a number of my liking was easy the it looks very sturdy. I hope it lasts :)
customer_reviews.author: Andre Farinazo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well and gives peace of mind when grandkids are over
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Byrd

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of chinese crap. It doesn't actually fit any trigger. I have a remington 870, and you can still maneuver the trigger lock to pull the trigger. Defeats the purpose. Also, it does not come with any packaging on how to actually set the lock. Overall, you get a paperweight for a product that should be for safety. This crap should not even be allowed to be sold on Amazon in the states with the gun control stuff. I am trying to protect people with a trigger lock, and am getting a piece of crap instead
customer_reviews.author: bpmeagher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Trigger Lock
customer_reviews.text: Qucik security, and easy removal... Great quality, and fits all of my guns: Beretta PX4 Storm, Winchester shotgun, Springfield XD, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good stuff. arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: good stuff. arrived on time, just as described. fits my 92fs aright. not the tightest fit though. still, good stuff
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Very adequate trigger locak.
customer_reviews.text: Work well, but could come with some directions on how to set up a number code for the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Nordic

customer_reviews.title: No instruction
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with any instructions. I have no idea how to open it or set the combination. Essentially I bought a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my guns
customer_reviews.text: The lock arrived quicker than expected. I would have given it 5 stars. But there was no instructions with the lock, to change the combination. Thanks to YouTube I was able to figure it out. It fits all of my guns.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good lock, never hunt for the key
customer_reviews.text: I like knowing I no longer have to keep track of a key. It is very durable and locks very tightly. I do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: LarrySun

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst company/product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst company/product ever. Came with a flimsy box and there were no instruments on how to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guo Xu

customer_reviews.title: first one worked fine. This one I can't set the new
customer_reviews.text: This is the second lock I received from my order, first one worked fine. This one I can't set the new code
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good but wont fit in glock 27 case.
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose but the only problem it doest fit inside my glock case. I ca t close the case with the lock attached to the gun. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Fits well. Much better than having a key to lose!
customer_reviews.author: russ griffith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Added safety for when my Taurus is not in secured case.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Herron

customer_reviews.title: Secure locking device
customer_reviews.text: Fits all of my weapons. Secures access to triger. Can set your own combination which is super easy. Would recommend. NEVER LEAVE ANY GUN STORED LOADED!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Instructions Please
customer_reviews.text: The lock itself is great. However the product didn't come with any instructions. So I don't know how to change the lock combination from the factory settings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price it good value it dosent advertise itself as the best on the market but it does what it says and thats all that matters, i gave this 5 stars because gun locks are hard to get here only through gun smiths so it would have been 5 times the price. Good product for the price
customer_reviews.author: David Burke

customer_reviews.title: Locks fit guns. Adjustment for 45ACP will be needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Locks fit guns. Adjustment for 45ACP will be needed. The lock still worked on this gun.
customer_reviews.author: georgel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does. Pretty easy to use, have it on a shotgun.
customer_reviews.author: BillyOC

customer_reviews.title: 9mm Locked Down!
customer_reviews.text: Trigger lock worked great for my 9mm S&W. Easy to set my own combination for security. Would definitely recommend for other gun owners.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very Satisfied -- Gun lock just as described, fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Universal fit
customer_reviews.text: I used this on some antiques weapons. They fit fine, were very sturdy and I had no trouble installing them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth DeVault

customer_reviews.title: Trigger lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock is ok but it needed modification to accommodate the safety lock mechanism on the shotgun I want to use it on
customer_reviews.author: Arden Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: The lock works perfect on my gun
customer_reviews.text: The lock works perfect on my gun, The code is easy to change and its easy to take the lock off I will buy more for my other guns
customer_reviews.author: Erick H

customer_reviews.title: The trigger lock came quickly and was very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The trigger lock came quickly and was very easy to use. I like it. It fit right on my pump shotgun.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Righi

customer_reviews.title: Makes the item useless, doesn't it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work. However, there were no instructions included on the combination setting process. Makes the item useless, doesn't it?
customer_reviews.author: Valora Walker

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Item did meet expectations, was able to set a new pass code with mo issues. Fit all my guns with no problems. Will order some more.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Baeza

customer_reviews.title: Trigger lock as described
customer_reviews.text: Trigger lock arrived within a few days and was the same as described. I would recommend this product to anyone needing a trigger lock.
customer_reviews.author: Angus Titus

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the plastic peeled off, poor quality, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look at other locks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Remington 870 shotgun. With this lock in place you can still load, toggle the safe, and fire. If you want the 'look' of being secure go ahead and buy this. If you want to secure your firearm, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jedly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trigger locks
customer_reviews.text: This great...fit all my guns...except my lever action (no surprise there) very secure yet easy to operate. Will get more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E. Fortune

customer_reviews.title: QUICK ACCESS IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: WORKS SO WELL I PURCHASED TWO MORE VERY CONVIENENT. IS THE BEST LOVE THE QUICK ACCESS IS GREAT NO MORE SEARCHING FOR THE KEY
customer_reviews.author: Richard V Haas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This trigger lock is perfect for my purposes. It fits my Home defense firearms securely and is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Surrett

customer_reviews.title: Locks suck
customer_reviews.text: This one sucks less than others but it's still a bother. Fits where it's needed (or required by law) and fast if you only have to change 1 number.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Good item, had to contact seller to find out how to set combination
customer_reviews.text: Great item but didn't come with instructions. That being said, the seller was good at responding to tell me there are no instructions that come with it and explain how to set the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie4184

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set new combination by opening and depressing indented ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set new combination by opening and depressing indented button. Fits great on Mossburg 500. Price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine but came without instructions which I found for another make that worked
customer_reviews.author: ignitor monster

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I NEED "INSTRUCTIONS" TO SET THE COMBINATION. PLEASE EMAIL TO: larrytfm@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Changed wording and deleted my review...NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: After I wrote my review that they stated this fits ALL guns with a trigger guard and I also posted it doesn't fit my .357 sig Springfield Armory...with trigger guard...they deleted my review and changed the wording in their advertisement...NICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.description: 3-Dial Combination Trigger Gun Lock Safe Universal Firearms Pistol Rifle Shotgun
